dict.acceptation: 剩余，剩下(remain的现在分词)；保持；停留，逗留；

sent.orig: Top with remaining pears, then with remaining breadcrumb mixture.
sent.trans: 上面再放剩余的梨、再放剩余的面包屑混合物。

sent.orig: Has a remaining capacity check function verification of the battery remaining capacity with 3 color levels.
sent.trans: 拥有”电池保有电量检测功能”通过3个颜色的灯来显示电池保有电量水平。

sent.orig: Smooth blasting of slope excavation would inevitably bring on damnification of slope remaining rock mass.
sent.trans: 边坡开挖爆破必然造成边坡保留岩体的损伤。

sent.orig: After remaining behind the leading runner for most of the race, Jim suddenly passed him and won.
sent.trans: 赛跑中的大部分时间里，吉姆跑在领先的运动员之后，后来突然超过去，获得了胜利。

sent.orig: Locate the remaining materials needed to complete the glider. Once completed, traverse to the underground laboratory.
sent.trans: 找到完成滑翔机所需的剩下的零件。一旦完成，穿过地下的实验室。
